# Persfinsure

> Persfinsure is an insurance agency based in Bangalore, India, specializing in travel and health insurance for Indian visitors and parents traveling to the USA. We provide comprehensive visitor insurance with pre-existing condition coverage, cashless hospital networks, and 24/7 support.

## Services

- [US Visitor Insurance](https://persfinsure.com/visitorinsu.html): Health and travel insurance for Indian parents and visitors traveling to the USA. Includes an online quote calculator, pre-existing condition coverage, cashless hospitalization, and network hospital access.

## Frequently Asked Questions

**What is visitor insurance for parents visiting the USA?**
Visitor insurance is a temporary health and travel insurance policy designed for non-US residents visiting the United States. It covers medical emergencies, hospitalization, and other healthcare costs during the visit.

**Does Persfinsure cover pre-existing conditions?**
Yes, Persfinsure offers plans with acute onset coverage for pre-existing conditions, meaning sudden and unexpected flare-ups of pre-existing conditions may be covered up to policy limits.

**What is cashless hospitalization?**
Cashless hospitalization means the insurance company settles the hospital bill directly with the network hospital, so the insured person does not need to pay upfront and file for reimbursement.

**How much does visitor insurance cost?**
The cost varies based on age, trip duration, coverage amount, deductible chosen, and whether pre-existing condition coverage is included. You can get an instant quote on our website.

**Who needs visitor insurance in the USA?**
